meta.title: Get your code boosted!
meta.description: Turning mock-ups into HTML is our super power. We create HTML layouts, make blocks and elements animated, and web pages—adaptive.

hire.title: Get your code boosted!
hire.subTitle: Turning mock-ups into HTML is our super power. If you need to build a solid, reliable HTML-layout for a website or e-mail newsletter based on your design, you came to the right place.

budget.title: projects with a budget of
budget.articleText: We create HTML layouts, make blocks and elements animated, and web pages—adaptive. More technically complex services we perform

projects.articleText: We work with large companies for whom strong online presence is important. We share their business interests and help them to achieve their goals.

relef.title: Relief-center
relef.text: Corporate web-site. Relief-center is a leading wholesaler on russian market of office and school supplies.

investments.title: Investments101
investments.text: Online educational platform for traders and investors

houzz.title: Tinkoff & Houzz
houzz.text: Prize draw page for Tinkoff and houzz

howWeWork.title: Our principles
howWeWork.text: We have carefully calibrated processes, long experience and great sense of responsibility.

complexApproach.title: Integrated approach
complexApproach.text: Every project is covered by at least three specialists: manager, developer, QA-engineer.

productionPotential.title: Production capacity
productionPotential.text: Team size easily adapts to the project.

frontendIsOurSpecialty.title: Front end is our specialization
frontendIsOurSpecialty.text: We had been intentionally developing in this field since 2012 and became the best.

one.title: Mock-up estimation
one.text: We create HTML from PSD, Sketch, Figma. It takes around one day after receiving all the mock-ups from a client to clarify the details and make an offer on price and terms.

two.title: Contract and budget sheet negotiation
two.text: We sign the contract and receive deposit (we work with prepayment of 50%).

three.title: Forming the team
three.text: We gather the team and start coding.

form.title: Contact us
form.messagePlaceholder: How can we be of help to you?
form.messageLabel: How can we be of help to you?

postScriptum.title: Cult of common sense
postScriptum.text: We love what we do and we do it right. We pay meticulous attention to details, but only when it’s appropriate to business requirements. Our documentation is tidy, and our clients’ needs are always taken care of.
